import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Form, Button, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap/Container" export default function Formulario() { const [emprestimo, setEmprestimo] = useState(props.emprestimo) function manipularMudanca(evento) { const elemForm = evento.currentTarget; const id = elemForm.id; const valor = elemForm.value; setEmprestimo({ ...emprestimo, [id]: valor }); } return (
